item.title: CVE-2020-5207|2024-08-04T08:22:09.258Z -- ktor.io -- ktor
item.description: In Ktor before 1.3.0, request smuggling is possible when running behind a proxy that doesn't handle Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding properly or doesn't handle \n as a headers separator.
